price: 141.Israa-iil xayloy Ni niqmatay sin amol yani cusay firqawnaa kee kay mari uma digaalá sin tammoysak lab-xaylo siinik qidaanaah Say-xaylo nuwwuk siinik cabak sugen waqdi sin Naggosnem, tama naggoysiyyat sin Rabbik kaxxa mokkoro siinih edde tan.
arabic: وَإِذۡ أَنجَيۡنَٰكُم مِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ يَسُومُونَكُمۡ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ يُقَتِّلُونَ أَبۡنَآءَكُمۡ وَيَسۡتَحۡيُونَ نِسَآءَكُمۡۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكُم بَلَآءٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh anjaynākum min āli fir'ʿawna yasūmūnakum sūa al-ʿadhābi yuqattilūna abnāakum wayastaḥyūna nisāakum wafī dhālikum balāon min rabbikum ʿaẓīmun
